title: Call for Papers Time
brief: The GDG Düsseldorf DevFest is coming up! 2014 we held a very popular "DevFest", 2015 we took a break - and now it is 2016 and we are back again!Mark the dates! #GDGDus will host Devfest2016, a developer conference, the weekend of October 22 and 23.We are looking motivated speakers for the conference, speakers who would like to share their wisdom on topics around modern development and/or various technologies with us. [Submit your Proposal](https://goo.gl/forms/ICJGuxERKkgMTh9J2). Call for Papers will end September 18!

title: First speakers for the GDG devfest, Düsseldorf
brief: Today we are lucky to announce our first speakers for our upcoming devfest!
